item.title: Golden Village Multiplex is the first in Singapore to introduce Auro 11.1 audio technology
item.description: Golden Village Multiplex is the first cinema chain in Singapore to offer Auro 11.1 by Barco, an immersive 3D sound technology. Long, Long Time Ago portrays Singapore approximately 50 years in the past. Audiences can experience Auro 11.1 at Golden Village Suntec City in Singapore with the debut of Jack Neo’s newest Chinese New Year film, Long, Long Time Ago (我们的故事), premiering February 4th. To fully utilize this immersive audio technology, the film was mixed at Galaxy Studios Belgium specifically for Auro 11.
